name: uwri3d.com
description: UWRi3D Public Website and Application Portal

scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && yarn build" "cd client && yarn build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd client && yarn dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
